deformablemesh

Class DeformableMesh3DTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.DeformableMesh3DTools

  • public class DeformableMesh3DTools
extends Object
    Collection of static methods for creating meshes. Creating binary/mosaic images. Performing some basic operations.

      • createRectangleMesh

        public static DeformableMesh3D createRectangleMesh(double width,
                                                   double height,
                                                   double depth,
                                                   double segment_size)
        Makes a rectangular prism mesh with triangular elements.
        Parameters:
        width - size in x direction
        height - size in y direction
        depth - size in z direction
        segment_size - size of each segment.
        Returns:
        a mesh that will deform according to an image.

      • centerAndRadius

        public static double[] centerAndRadius(List<Node3D> nodes)
        Calculates the center based on the position of the nodes. Finds the mean distance from the center. Since the nodes are not evenly distributed this method can be biased.
        Parameters:
        nodes - Nodes of the current mesh.
        Returns:
        {x, y, z, r}

      • scanDirty

        public static void scanDirty(List<Intersection> sections)
        This puts topographical constraints on the intersections. When an intersection is 'dirty' it means it was decided at a region of low confidence.
        Parameters:
        sections -

        centroid -
        Returns:

      • mergeMeshes

        public static DeformableMesh3D mergeMeshes(List<DeformableMesh3D> meshes)
        Each mesh is constructed of 3 essential data values: positions, triangles, connections. positions : double[] of length 3*vertex. trianges : int[] of length triangles. connection_index : int[] of length 2*connections
        Parameters:
        meshes -
        Returns:
